HIPPLUG-938
Add support for category filtering in the CMS taxonomy picker plugin, see the CMS configuration page.
Tech Note: involves addition of an extra argument ITaxonomyService in the constructor of objects JcrTaxonomy and JcrCategory in the CMS plugin. There is a getter for that service too.

HIPPLUG-730 and HIPPLUG-159
In the taxonomy tree editor, add a check for duplicate keys to prevent errors.

HIPPLUG-504
In the taxonomy tree editor, no longer add the user's locale to the show list of locales but just show the configured ones.

HIPPLUG-879
Fix ClassCastException when adding synonyms in the taxonomy editor.

HIPPLUG-799
Allow having more than one taxonomy field in a document type. See Add extra taxonomy picker page.
Upgrade to Hippo 7.9. This involves Wicket 6 and Java 7 compatibility and means this version is no longer compatible with previous Hippo versions.

HIPPLUG-799
Allow having more than one taxonomy field in a document type.

HIPPLUG-690 and HIPPLUG-688
Improvements in the CMS configuration page.

HIPPLUG-693
Fixed domains for taxonomies in 7.8: editors and authors must have read-write access to taxonomy nodes.
Note: involves a hippo:reloadonstartup flag on the initialize item of the taxonomy domain rules (use -Drepo.bootstrap=true to reload the domain rules).

HIPPLUG-659 (1.09.03 follow up)
Use the SettingsService to get a node name codec (no functional change)

HIPPLUG-291
When adding a new category through the CMS, the keyed in name ends up as the label now.

HIPPLUG-659
Add possibility by configuration to make keys URL friendly. See page CMS Configuration.

HIPPLUG-290
